items.text: fuller length outside off, he was walking across but ends up defending it towards mid-on
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Nitish: "Have to say that thought Bangladesh did well to restrict west indies to 261. But Roach looks like a handful on this track. Things are bound to get difficult with Gabriel and Holder yet to bowl. Also, this is the first time that Bangladesh and West Indies are part of a tri-series together. "
items.text: full one, ends up as a full toss. Slower one, Sarkar ends up pushing it to mid-on
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: nicely pulled, but there is protection in the deep. Too short and Sarkar has shown he's willing to take those on, swivels and connects with the pull
items.shortText: Cottrell to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length ball outside off, slapped to point
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: very full on off, he unleashes a nice looking drive, going down on one knee, but cannot go past cover
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off - punched to cover
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length outside off, he gets down low and plays with the bat almost parallel to the ground, gliding it off the face to third man
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off and rising up, Tamim wants to punch it but only gets it off the inside half of the bat as the ball rolls towards cover
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: the pressure is telling on Tamim. He wanted to flay this length ball through the offside, but got an inside edge on the pad. He wanted an ill-advised quick single but had to scramble back with Roach running down to try and kick the ball onto the stumps
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: very full, in the slot to drive and Tamim unleashes a peachy looking cover drive - but straight to cover. The dot balls are piling up
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: gets it through the gap another over-pitched delivery and Tamim takes a big stride out to get to the pitch of the ball and places the textbook cover drive between cover and extra cover
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: another one Tamim is breaking free finally. Wasn't that short but he latched on to the length, went back and cut this fiercely past point
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: another nice looking punch to a back of length ball outside off, but backward point puts in a dive to save runs
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText:
Gabriel

Sean: "Poor cricket no intent to rotate the strike or keep the scoreboard going. I was hoping BD will be a good team in WC but of they play like this there's no way they will be able to compete against the best teams. " - they started slow, but they're doing pretty okay now.
items.text: full ball outside off, driven past cover but without timing
items.shortText: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: good length angling into him from around the wicket, he jabs it towards gully
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: gets the angle wrong that time and too far down leg
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, 1 wide

items.text: fuller on off, driven crisply but can't go past extra cover
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: that one came back in sharply and bounced more than he expected off a fuller length. Ends up squirting it towards point from close to his body
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short of a length and rising up but on leg stump and he is able to get inside the line and pat it down
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length again, but Tamim is able to  swivel and pull this to deep square leg
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: David: "Is Lewis also part of the WI squad for the WC?" Indeed he is. Here is the West Indies squad.
items.text: around the wicket but angling too far in, clips the pads and runs down to fine leg for a boundary. Bad ball.
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 4 leg byes

items.text: angling in too much again and clipped off his toes to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: fuller length outside off, he comes forward to push it, takes the thick inside edge to roll to square leg
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: smoked. Full outside off and Sarkar has a free swing of his arms, unleashes a superb lofted drive that carries all the way past the straight boundary
items.shortText: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

items.text: full outside off again, he opens the face to steer it to third man
items.shortText: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run
